channel.title: CVE Feed for NewType -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NewType -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9968|2024-10-15T13:39:38.622Z -- newtype -- webeip
item.description:
WebEIP v3.0 from
NewType does not properly validate user input, allowing remote attackers with regular privilege to inject SQL commands to read, modify, and delete data stored in database. The affected product is no longer maintained. It is recommended to upgrade to the new product.

item.title: CVE-2024-9968|2024-10-15T02:40:44.637Z -- newtype -- webeip
item.description:
WebEIP v3.0 from
NewType does not properly validate user input, allowing remote attackers with regular privilege to inject SQL commands to read, modify, and delete data stored in database. The affected product is no longer maintained. It is recommended to upgrade to the new product.

item.title: CVE-2024-9969|2024-10-15T03:26:33.730Z -- newtype -- webeip
item.description: NewType WebEIP v3.0 does not properly validate user input, allowing a remote attacker with regular privileges to insert JavaScript into specific parameters, resulting in a Reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attack. The affected product is no longer maintained. It is recommended to upgrade to the new product.

item.title: CVE-2024-9971|2024-10-15T03:39:56.141Z -- newtype -- flowmaster%20bpm%20plus
item.description: The specific query functionality in the FlowMaster BPM Plus from NewType does not properly restrict user input, allowing remote attackers with regular privileges to inject SQL commands to read, modify, or delete database contents.

item.title: CVE-2024-9970|2024-10-15T03:36:15.595Z -- newtype -- flowmaster%20bpm%20plus
item.description: The FlowMaster BPM Plus system from NewType has a privilege escalation vulnerability. Remote attackers with regular privileges can elevate their privileges to administrator by tampering with a specific cookie.
